text: The top 25 scorers in National Football League history are all placekickers. Statistics include regular season scoring only. Active players are listed in bold (age in parentheses). Statistics are accurate as of end of the 2019 season. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:left" |- ! Rank ! style="text-align:left" | Player ! Career !
